name: Kindled Cavern
description: Kindled Cavern is a cave exploration adventure for Virtual Reality filled with sights to behold. Waterfalls, bamboo forests, giant turtles, abandoned bridges and scaffolding, subterranian lakes, and ancient arches fill this explorable cavern. Not to mention the ghosts!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, or Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better Storage: 250 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
